document_description: This resolution regulates the insurance system for the agricultural sector, among others in case of adverse climate events. It determines the Agricultural Insurance in Colombia as a reactivation activity of the National Agricultural Reactivation Program (PRAN), and transfers resources to the Fund for the Financing of the Agricultural Sector (Finagro), destined to the National Fund of Agricultural Risks. This is based on articles 1 and 84 of from law 101 of 1993 on agricultural and fishing development.
